posts.title: What do you think about this?
posts.body: I had an idea for saving money...how about just not spending it?!?

posts.title: Hey dude, let's do lunch
posts.body: Yoo let's hit up Wright's BBQ. We can leave at 11:45, cool?

posts.title: Going to highschool backetball game
posts.body: Hey, after work im going to watch the high school varsity girls play backetball. It should be a good match.

posts.title: Fiori Workflows
posts.body: Hey what's up man. I haven't heard back from offshore yet about setting up the workflow in sandbox. Still waiting.

posts.title: Can you test Principal Propagation?
posts.body: Hey Jaimen, can you test the principal propagation in dev? We've made some changes and i want to make sure we didn't break anything.

posts.title: CD 80000012345 is Pre-Approved
posts.body: This change doc is pre-approve but you'll have to represent it on the CAB call tomorrow morning. Thank you!

posts.title: OSS Incident 12345 / 2019
posts.body: Hey this is Keith with SAP. Im having trouble logging into your network.

posts.title: Oh yeah, I almost forgot!
posts.body: Can you fix that lightbulb in the garage? Thanks

posts.title: OSS Incident 67890 / 2019
posts.body: Hey this is Keith with SAP. Is the HTTP connections open? I can't connect.
